text: The Caribbean Community , or CARICOM, is a group of nations in the Caribbean Sea that have come together founded on 4 July 1973. They share their products, and they have a government to help organize the area. They are mainly together to help trade and their economies. The full members are: * Barbados * Belize * Dominica * Grenada * Guyana * Haiti * Jamaica * Montserrat (a territory of the United Kingdom) * Saint Kitts and Nevis * Saint Lucia * Saint Vincent and the Grenadines * Suriname * Trinidad and Tobago * United States Category:1973 establishments
title: Caribbean Community
